dict.acceptation: 锦标赛；锦标，优胜，冠军称号；拥护者[支持者，提倡者]的身分；保持冠军称号的时期；

sent.orig: Azinger was referring to Anthony away Wachovia Championship and was at &t of the National Championship.
sent.trans: 阿辛格指的是安东尼夺得美联银行锦标赛和at&t全国锦标赛冠军。

sent.orig: True, but Brown a role in the Lakers winning the NBA championship last season.
sent.trans: 嗯，这是事实。但是布朗在上季湖人赢得冠军的征途中的确有所贡献。

sent.orig: Our baseball team is contending for the championship.
sent.trans: 我们的棒球队为锦标赛而争取。

sent.orig: When So Paulo was eliminated from the Brazilian championship in2003, he drew boos.
sent.trans: 当圣保罗失去2003年巴西联赛的冠军时，他引来了嘘声。

sent.orig: Championship last season, Bayern rely on solid defense, the 21 Bundesliga goals against Guanjue.
sent.trans: 上赛季夺冠，拜仁靠的是坚固的防守，21个失球冠绝德甲。
